law.catch_line: The Department shall establish an Animal Waste Technology Fund Advisory Committee....

text.section: The Department shall establish an Animal Waste Technology Fund Advisory Committee.
The Secretary of Agriculture shall be the Chair of the Advisory Committee and the Department will provide staff support.

The Secretary shall appoint committee representatives to include the poultry and livestock industries, agricultural community, environmental community, agricultural fertilizer industries, energy sector, and other areas of expertise as deemed appropriate.

In consultation with the Animal Waste Technology Fund Advisory Committee, the Department shall:
Develop program criteria;
Review proposals; and
Make project funding determinations.
